resources.string: A service that provide a basic screen saver.
Start when charging \nStop when not charging

The Zebra Screen Saver Service will provide a basic screensaver.
Service can be started with adb:
adb shell am broadcast -a com.zebra.screensaver.startservice
Service can be stopped with adb:
adb shell am broadcast -a com.zebra.screensaver.stopservice
Zebra Screen Saver Power Events Watcher
A service that watch for power events (docked, charging) to start or stop Zebra Screen Saver Service.
Zebra Screen Saver Service Power Events Watcher
